name: Zone G
description:
This  game is currently in progress therefore there may be bugs or issues. Zone G:

Zone G is a game that changes genres as you play it, this means you could be playing a first person shooter that suddenly evolves into a 2d platformer.  

This  game is currently in progress therefore there may be bugs or issues. Sorry for the inconvenicance. But feel free to let me know about them in a comment below so that I can get to fixing it.

This is the progress made so far in under 2 weeks. Its nothing great but I still think its pretty neat. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: FPS:
  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump
  • SHIFT- Sprint
  • CONTROL - Crouch
  • RIGHT CLICK - Zoom
  • E - Pick things Up
  • G - Drop Things
  • LEFT CLICK - Shoot
PLATFORMER:
  • AD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
